about_the_game:
Scour the depths for ancient technology and use it to build a fleet of biomechanical warships and take down the Federation. Upgrade your Manta with powerful genetic upgrades. Dogfight with interceptors and submarines. Defend your fleet from bombers, corvettes and marauding DeepHunters. Take out that anti-ship cannon before it destroys your frigates- all in this one mission!

This also includes a tutorial mission to get you used to flying, fleet design, construction and command, as well as resource management.
